/Calendar.aspx
  1. News Flash

News Flash

  1. Mayor Selects New Project Manager for Consent Decree Project

    On April 4, 2019, the Architect and Engineering Committee convened to discuss the Program Manager submittals for the Capital Improvement and Consent Decree project. The committee ranked the submissions and presented them to the Mayor. Additional Info...

  2. Mayor Announces Future Leaders of Shreveport Summer Internship Program

    Mayor Adrian Perkins is proud to announce the Future Leaders of Shreveport Summer Internship Program. This internship program offers more than one-hundred local high school and college students the opportunity to work in City Government and ... Additional Info...

  3. Boil Advisory Lifted

    The Louisiana Department of Health/Office of Public Health has lifted the boil advisory for customers north of Ravendale Road and Martin Luther King, Jr. Drive; East of Interstate 49; and West and South of Old Mooringsport Road. Additional Info...

  1. Boil Advisory for parts of north Shreveport

    There was a water main breach in or near your area. The water was cut off for repairs. Site Location(s): All Shreveport water customers North of Ravendale Road and Martin Luther King Drive; East of Interstate 49; and West and South of Old Mooringsport Additional Info...

  2. Pre-Apprenticeship Truck Driving Program with Diesel Driving Academy

    The Department of Community Development, Bureau of Workforce Development, and WIOA Youth Program are seeking Youth ages 21-24 years of age for a Pre-apprenticeship Truck Driving Program. Additional Info...

  3. Shreveport-Bossier Community Assistance Resource Guide - Released

    Read on...
